title: Ticket #3439: change the permissions of files in the input sandbox to be restrictive
description: currently, we preserve the file permissions for all files that we transfer into the input sandbox for a job (except the executable, which we set to 0755). i can't think of a compelling reason to preserve the exact permissions for input files, and would instead prefer that we binary-AND the permissions with 0700 to strip access for groups and other users (and then binary-OR the actual executable with 0100 to set the execute bit for the user only).
